title: Hey
body: Hey just yesterday my friend clicked on athis link it was like League0flegends the " Of " is a 0 and so it was a fake website it was like free rp or something. And so he lost his account and I feel really bad. Can anybody help him? He has no control of his email or anything. {{champion:83}}

replies.body: The best step your friend can take is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Account Recovery Specialists should be able to help him out and get him access to his account again!
